comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: The caption written on the photograph says "500-mile race, Indianapolis" -- was it not being called the "Indianapolis 500" yet?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: You make a good point, Lu, thank you.  The present title is better placed with the tags.  We will revise the title to match the caption next time we update the record.  Additionally, the caption provides the exact date.

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: More than I expected :) I really didn't know! I do suspect it's tough to find the point at which tag/etc. info is narrow enough to be accurate but still broad enough to be searchable.
